questions.question: What is the name of the city that shifts?
citation_spans: The city of Lumenfall did not stay still.

questions.question: At what time does the Noon Shift occur?
citation_spans: Every day at exactly 12:00 noon, the city changed its layout.

questions.question: What is the duration of the Noon Shift?
What fixed object never moves in the city?
citation_spans: At the center of Lumenfall stood the Oblique Tower. The tower never moved.

questions.question: What is the name of the Cartographer who broke the rule?
